query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZDST100 SET DS100_PJT = #PJT#, DS100_PNM = #PNM#, DS100_CNM = #CNM#, DS100_NAM = #NAM#, DS100_DEP = #DEP#, DS100_TEL = #TEL#, DS100_FAX = #FAX#, DS100_EML = #EML#, DS100_ENM = #ENM#, DS100_MDL = #MDL#, DS100_MAK = #MAK#, DS100_CMD = #CMD#, DS100_WDY = #WDY#, DS100_BDY = #BDY#, DS100_BGN = #BGN#, DS100_SDJ = #SDJ#, DS100_SDY = #SDY#, DS100_MSD = #MSD#, DS100_MED = #MED#, DS100_USD = #USD#, DS100_UED = #UED#, DS100_RST = #RST#, DS100_ERR = #ERR#, DS100_J01 = #J01#, DS100_J02 = #J02#, DS100_J03 = #J03#, DS100_J04 = #J04#, DS100_J05 = #J05#, DS100_J06 = #J06#, DS100_SGN = #SGN#, DS100_SCT = #SCT#, DS100_C01 = #C01#, DS100_C02 = #C02#, DS100_C03 = #C03#, DS100_C04 = #C04#, DS100_C05 = #C05#, DS100_C06 = #C06#, DS100_C07 = #C07#, DS100_C08 = #C08#, DS100_C09 = #C09#, DS100_C10 = #C10#, DS100_C11 = #C11#, DS100_C12 = #C12#, DS100_C13 = #C13#, DS100_C14 = #C14#, DS100_C15 = #C15#, DS100_I01 = #I01#, DS100_I02 = #I02#, DS100_I03 = #I03#, DS100_I04 = #I04#, DS100_I05 = #I05#, DS100_I06 = #I06#, DS100_UDT = HEX(CURRENT DATE), DS100_UID = #G_USER_ID# WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND DS100_SEQ = #SEQ#
